name: A False World
description: A False World is a 2D platformer game with an interesting storyline and different game modes. The setting is chosen to be minimalistic which gives the user a soothing experience. There are many different kinds of levels with many twists and turns that will intrigue the user and will make them want to play more. Our player is basically a solid square who has to reach from one point to another in order to achieve its goal.
